name: AromatherapyTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open aromatherapy trivia”
”Alexa, start aromatherapy trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aromatherapy trivia
des:
Ask Alexa to open aromatherapy trivia and discover ways essential oils and herbs can be used and have been used. Test your knowledge among friends (up to four players) or play solo. Alexa will quiz you on aromatherapy. Provide the answer and try to achieve the title of master nose. 
Charmed in Company LLP is the oldest Mystical Metaphysical shoppe in NJ. We created this skill as a way of introducing people to some common uses of essential oils and herbs to improve their lives. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
